title: Sakuo the Punch
body:
Yet another champion whom all the damage comes from basic attacks.

HP 498+68 4.7/5sec +0.98
Energy 200
AD 53+3.88
Atk speed 0.653+0.018
Armor 22+0.98
MR 18+1.32
Speed 335


Passive: Broken Bones  Every 4th hit on the same opponent within 20sec of the first hit cripples them slowing by 15%, applies grievous wounds and taking 10% bonus damage from auto attacks. Lasts 5sec


Q: Mega punch.  8sec cool 60energy
Next basic attack deals 45/70/95/120/145 bonus damage and stuns them for 0.75sec.
Grants double lifesteal effect

W: Mega Kick 8sec cool 80 energy
Deals 60/70/80/90/100% AD +25/50/75/100/125 AD to one unit and knocking them back 475 spaces.

E: Will power Punches
Passive: Each basic attack deals 15/20/25/30/35 bonus TD Simultaneous attacks grant 1 stack (5more TD) for 2.5 sec up to a max of 30 stacks. Stacks gained are tripled for Q and W and R.


R: Giga impact 90sec
Dashes to an enemy stunning him for 1.5sec while dealing 125/150/175% AD +125/250/375 Physical damage to him over the duration.

replies.body:
Please, most of the stats are wayyyyyy to over, do you mind changing them a little or perhaps lowering them down a little 5-10%? e.g. his R has way too much AD damage, while he can land many autos on the enemy, however the rest is probably ok and ft to go.
Cheers, have a great day!
SilentXKiller

you see the problem is except for his ult, he has no range closers. Meaning if he builds full AD he will be killed within seconds because he will need to walk up to enemies before able to deal damage. So it is not too over at all. have you ever tried walking into a teamfight in lategame as rengar?
how did it go? by late game i mean everyone has full build. I actually want you to show me....
Late-game rengar will walk up to ADC's and one-shot them
nah mate, he would get picked off by cc before he can reach the adc, i do mean walk, no passive leap or ult

I very much highly doubt any Rengar player, or any player in general... would "Walk up" to an ADC without some kind of CC ability or gapcloser... Rengar's mostly ALWAYS engage with their ult, or with a jump stun from bush, unless you have some kind of mental problem and don't know how to play him :/
oi mate, dont reply that to me, im correcting Silent x killer

You were, and you insisted on "proof" that Silent could walk up to adc's without getting melted, you also mentioned to me that Rengars are useless if they're "walking up to adc, without any ult, jump or CC"...
and I simply stated that Rengar's aren't that daft... You don't exactly play Rengar because he can heal on his W at 5 stacks... you play him for his ult, gapcloser and CC

omg ffs me and silent are friends in real life we know each other. I have him in friend list. And YES, if rengar do walk up he will die. I tried that in 10 games and around 5 team fights each, i died in 47 of them.
But then thats the other bit, i SAID they would get melted if they walk in. SO THATS WHY they ult or passive leap in, because rengar players are daft.....
Yes, we are best friends man, don't you worry, but to be honest you can just call in all chat i need to walk into your team and not die pls and then walk in... xD
btw im in bronze 1 now with u in the exact same league
But why would you even mention that... No rengar (except a few -you?-) would walk up to an ADC... like "walk up" to them...
So basically, this is Alistar right? W knocks back, Q stuns, and Ult is basically WW! Great
